last_episode_to_air.name: Day One
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mel does everything in her power to save a gravely wounded Sandy, while Griffin finally confronts the reality of his addiction.

name: Remedy
overview: Griffin Conner, a med-school dropout having left in a haze of disgrace, is forced to return to Bethune General Hospital as its newest orderly and work alongside his family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the first season, Griffin Conner, a med school dropout having left in a haze of disgrace, is forced to return to Bethune General Hospital as its newest orderly. Working “downstairs” alongside a cast of colourful characters, Griffin gets a new perspective on a world he thought he knew.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two kicks off nine months after the finale with each member of the Conner family pulled out of their comfort zones and Bethune Hospital in the midst of a colossal shake up. Griffin Conner seems to finally be getting his life on track with plans to return to medical school and a serious girlfriend, but his dark and troubled past continues to haunt him. Meanwhile, Allen must re-adjust following his demotion from Chief-of-Staff, while his daughters –surgeon Mel and new mom Sandy – search to balance co-parenting baby Toby with work and play. This season also sees the introduction of new ER Resident Dr Cutler, who is set to stir things up for the Connors.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: The Conner family is thrown back together in a haze of blood and confusion, as prodigal son Griffin returns to his second family home - Bethune General Hospital.

episodes.name: The Homecoming
episodes.overview: Griffin's first day as Bethune's newest porter is a rocky one, while Melissa forges an unlikely connection with the sister of a patient whose life she is scrambling to save.

episodes.name: Testing, Testing
episodes.overview: Brian resolves to improve his patient interaction after receiving several complaints, while Griffin forms an unlikely bond with a cantankerous war veteran. Dr. Tuttle refuses to consider Sandy’s diagnosis of a rare disease in a dancer.

episodes.name: Shift/Change
episodes.overview: When two babies die of a mysterious infection in the Paediatric ICU, Allen scrambles to find patient zero before Bethune General suffers a full-blown outbreak.

episodes.name: The Beast Within
episodes.overview: Bruno shocks everyone by making an obscure diagnosis that saves a patient’s life, and a momentous secret from his past is revealed. After being kicked by a patient, Sandy calls Melissa for help instead of Brian.

episodes.name: Scary Bears
episodes.overview: An offhand comment from Allen sends Melissa into a tailspin, while Brian desperately tries to atone for a past mistake.

episodes.name: Tomorrow the Green Grass
episodes.overview: When Rebecca is brought into the ER with a mysterious paralysis creeping up her body, Allen has to scramble to find out what's happening before it's too late.

episodes.name: Shadow of Doubt
episodes.overview: Griffin starts to spin out of control after a harrowing car accident evokes a traumatic event from his past and Bruno gives Mel some vital tips on purse string suturing.

episodes.name: The Little Things
episodes.overview: A tumultuous day at the hospital gives way to an awkward dinner with Brian’s family, leading to an astonishing revelation for Sandy.

episodes.name: Quit the Horizon
episodes.overview: Sandy struggles to say goodbye to Brian as her reconfigured family rally around to support her. Zoe and Griffin organize a labour stoppage after Lonnie is fired.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In the first season, Griffin Conner, a med school dropout having left in a haze of disgrace, is forced to return to Bethune General Hospital as its newest orderly. Working “downstairs” alongside a cast of colourful characters, Griffin gets a new perspective on a world he thought he knew.

episodes.name: Our Friend, Chaos
episodes.overview: An explosion rips through the downstairs of Beth-H, changing lives there forever.

episodes.name: When You Awake
episodes.overview: When an injured firefighter develops curious and frightening post-op symptoms, Mel and Jerry clash over how to proceed.

episodes.name: Playing Doctor Conner
episodes.overview: Griffin is forced to account for his actions when a patient dies while under his supervision.

episodes.name: Blood and Guts
episodes.overview: Allen performs an extraordinarily rare and dangerous medical procedure, and Zoe’s mother turns up at Beth-H unexpectedly.

episodes.name: Life in Technicolour
episodes.overview: Exhilarated by her new romance with Cutler, Mel is uncharacteristically reckless in the operating room.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Cutler is drawn into a critical case with a husband and wife who are at odds over the treatment of her unexplained illness.

episodes.name: Everything in Moderation
episodes.overview: Allen works to diagnose a reclusive young woman’s illness, while Griffin begins to come apart at the seams.

episodes.name: Looking for Satellites
episodes.overview: Mel explores the significance of a literal and figurative broken heart, while Griffin embarks on a drug-fueled odyssey.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: A clumsy attempt at addressing Griffin’s drug problem pushes him further down the spiral.

episodes.name: Day One
episodes.overview: Mel does everything in her power to save a gravely wounded Sandy, while Griffin finally confronts the reality of his addiction.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two kicks off nine months after the finale with each member of the Conner family pulled out of their comfort zones and Bethune Hospital in the midst of a colossal shake up. Griffin Conner seems to finally be getting his life on track with plans to return to medical school and a serious girlfriend, but his dark and troubled past continues to haunt him. Meanwhile, Allen must re-adjust following his demotion from Chief-of-Staff, while his daughters –surgeon Mel and new mom Sandy – search to balance co-parenting baby Toby with work and play. This season also sees the introduction of new ER Resident Dr Cutler, who is set to stir things up for the Connors.
